summary: Fixed HTML structure issue in booking-detail.blade.php. There was an extra closing tag on line 113 that was breaking the Bootstrap grid layout. The structure now correctly closes: col-lg-4 (line 112), row (line 113), and container (line 114). This ensures proper HTML nesting and prevents layout rendering issues.
current_status: HTML structure fixed. The Bootstrap grid layout is now properly balanced with correct div nesting. The col-lg-4, row, and container divs are correctly closed in the proper order. All files pass linting.
